discrepancies.finding: Bill of Lading does not indicate the name and address of the carrier
Bill of Lading does not indicate the name and address of the delivery agent at port of discharge
Bill of Lading does not indicate the actual port of loading
Bill of Lading does not indicate the actual port of discharge

compliances.finding: Bill of Lading is signed in the form described in UCP 600 subarticle 20 a i
Bill of Lading indicates the name of the carrier identified as the carrier
Bill of Lading indicates the goods description in general terms not in conflict with the goods description in the credit
Bill of Lading indicates the on board notation with the relevant on board date
